resources.string: Have a unique bussines startup plan ? \nCome let the world know your intention, illustrate your plan and join to have a glimpse of the wonderfull ideas your peers have.

Is your BOT the best ??\nParticipants gets the chance to compete with different bots on different backdrops like F1-race,All-terain, Robo Soccer The best BOT get all the goddies. Come its time to prove your BOTs worth
Are you a movies addict ??\nFilmy quiz welcomes all filmy buffs to discover how high your film quotients are! Compete with other addicts and prove yourself May the odds be in your favour

Want to face the heat of interview drill before the real test? \nParticipants shall undergo mock placements drive which will be conducted on the ground similar to their college placements .Their merit skills shall be put to test

Lets prove your creative structural skills.Build your own model by the given materials When someone starts using materials and fabrication techniques,they are able to refine their ideas to make them work
Are you a Tech Freak?? \nHere is your chance to prove yourself ,compete with the most nerdy tech guys Be the nerdest tech guy and win exciting tech products
